body:
Comment 1: 
I think I've seen this too, but I could never tell if it was a bug in my code. 

My app has crashed a few times because it tries to write to a nil tcp connection that 
was established with a successful (non-error) call to net.Dial. I just assumed it was 
some weird race condition because it happens very rarely. 

Could it happen if you establish a connection with net.Dial, close it, and then write 
to it?
